channel.title: [PI]Check IP Command[PI]

item.title: [PI]Check IP Command[PI]
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("getIP") && c.playerRights >= 1) {
    name = command.substring(6);
    for (int i = 0; i < Server.playerHandler.maxPlayers; i++)
        if (Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(name))
            c.sendMessage(Server.playerHandler.players[i].connectedFrom);
}

i copied his code that will fix a couple errors not all of them tho

item.title: [PI]Check IP Command[PI]
item.dc:creator: @Impious_Lols Impious Lols
item.description:
@Impious_Lols wrote:

How would I make a command that would check the IP of the person you enter?

Example:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("banip") && c.playerRights >= 1) { (How to fetch person's IP here) c.sendMessage("The user: "+Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName+" is connecting from: (Ip host here)"); }
